description: มิเตอร์ไฟฟ้าฝ่ายผลิต เฟส3

options.content:
POLIPHARM

มิเตอร์ฝ่ายผลิตไฟฟ้าโรงงาน

targets.query:
from(bucket: "energy-production")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_21")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
        r with 
        _field: if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_21" then "พลังงานไฟฟ้า (kWh)"
                else r._field 
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])  // แสดงเฉพาะคอลัมน์ที่ต้องการ
  |> yield(name: "mean")

defaults.displayName: พลังงานไฟฟ้าสะสม

targets.query:
from(bucket: "energy-production")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_4")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])  // แสดงเฉพาะคอลัมน์ที่ต้องการ
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

defaults.displayName: กระแสเฉลี่ย L-N

targets.query:
from(bucket: "energy-production")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_16")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])  // แสดงเฉพาะคอลัมน์ที่ต้องการ
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "energy-production")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_18" or 
                        r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_19" or 
                        r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_20")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
        r with 
        _field: if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_18" then "พลังงานไฟฟ้า L1 (kWh)"
                else if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_19" then "พลังงานไฟฟ้า L2 (kWh)"
                else if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_20" then "พลังงานไฟฟ้า L3 (kWh)"
                else r._field 
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])  // แสดงเฉพาะคอลัมน์ที่ต้องการ
  |> yield(name: "mean")

defaults.displayName: ระดับสัญญาน

targets.query:
from(bucket: "energy-production")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_uplink")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rssi")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])  // แสดงเฉพาะคอลัมน์ที่ต้องการ
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "energy-production")
  |> range(start: -1d, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_4")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])  
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: 💻 รายละเอียดเพิ่มเติม

targets.query:
from(bucket: "energy-production")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_8" or 
                        r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_9" or 
                        r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_10" or 
                        r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_12")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
        r with 
        _field: if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_8" then "L1-N"
                else if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_9" then "L2-N"
                else if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_10" then "L3-N"
                else if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_12" then "Average"
                else r._field 
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])  // แสดงเฉพาะคอลัมน์ที่ต้องการ
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "energy-production")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_5" or 
                        r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_6" or 
                        r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_7" or 
                        r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_value_11")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
        r with 
        _field: if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_5" then "L1-L2"
                else if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_6" then "L2-L3"
                else if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_7" then "L3-L1"
                else if r._measurement == "device_frmpayload_data_value_11" then "Average"
                else r._field 
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])  // แสดงเฉพาะคอลัมน์ที่ต้องการ
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "energy-production")
